body_html:
Yes; we should definitely update that to document the move back in TF 1.2; not 1.1.
…
On Thu, Apr 13, 2017 at 10:17 AM, Yifei Feng ***@***.***> wrote: Release note was updated in #7745 <#7745> to indicate that RNN is temporarily moved to contrib. But it also says it will be back in core in r1.1. We should update that part to 1.2, @ebrevdo <https://github.com/ebrevdo>? Also cc @av8ramit <https://github.com/av8ramit> for release. — You are receiving this because you were mentioned. Reply to this email directly, view it on GitHub <#7664 (comment)>, or mute the thread <https://github.com/notifications/unsubscribe-auth/ABtim3sUUEoVMa-NPKBs5iwpQ2hcTBeWks5rvliagaJpZM4MFasF> .

body:
Yes; we should definitely update that to document the  move back in TF 1.2;
not 1.1.

On Thu, Apr 13, 2017 at 10:17 AM, Yifei Feng <notifications@github.com>
wrote:

> Release note was updated in #7745
> <https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/pull/7745> to indicate that RNN
> is temporarily moved to contrib. But it also says it will be back in core
> in r1.1. We should update that part to 1.2, @ebrevdo
> <https://github.com/ebrevdo>? Also cc @av8ramit
> <https://github.com/av8ramit> for release.
>
> —
> You are receiving this because you were mentioned.
> Reply to this email directly, view it on GitHub
